actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reduce the indebtedness of certain native villages in Alaska to the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to reduce the indebtness to the United States of specific native villages in Alaska which was incurred for the acquisition and operation of salmon canneries.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the indebtedness of certain native villages in Alaska to the United States.
